metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8768 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Jupyter Notebook before 5.4.1, a maliciously forged notebook file can bypass sanitization to execute JavaScript in the notebook context. Specifically, invalid HTML is 'fixed' by jQuery after sanitization, making it dangerous.

notes.Note: ccdm94> ipython does not contain notebook starting on version 4.0.

criterions.comment: ipython: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
